comment.author: 59377114@N04
comment._content: The Mandala Company was founded in 1878 and the main Mandala House - which still stands was built in 1882. So it looks as if this temporary structure was erected between those dates. see www.societyofmalawi.org/mandalahouse.html

comment.author: 59419369@N05
comment._content: This photo was almost certainly taken in 1886 by Consul Hawes so the building of Mandala House in 1882 did not see the immediate demolition of the temporary structure.

comment.author: 60406173@N04
comment._content: As Mandala House, photo 108-39, was the manager's house and this bulding was the store and European clerks' quarters there seems no reason why the two couldn't have existed at the same time.
